meanings.sent1: Her deliriousnesses made it hard for her to focus on anything.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed him with deliriousnesses after the accident.
meanings.sent3: In the play, the character's deliriousnesses led to some hilarious misunderstandings.
meanings.sent4: The deliriousnesses of the storm clouded his judgment.
meanings.sent5: The deliriousnesses of the fever made the room spin around her.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being affected by delirium.
meanings.sent1: The deliriousnesses of the patient concerned the medical team.
meanings.sent2: His deliriousnesses were evident in his wild gestures and incoherent speech.
meanings.sent3: The deliriousnesses of the situation made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The deliriousnesses of the carnival transported her to a different world.
meanings.sent5: The deliriousnesses of the haunted house sent shivers down her spine.
